content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Mister Schmidt, a potential landlord in Duisburg, Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Yes
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. The negotiation reached an impasse, and I decided to terminate the conversation.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As we did not agree on a final price, I am unable to provide an exact number. The landlord, Mister Schmidt, was offering 900 euros per month, but I could not accept that price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Mister Schmidt, as a 7.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation with Mister Schmidt.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation with Mister Schmidt.
name: Haoyu Wang
